attributes.action: Direct teachers to use the Oak Academy resources if pupils are learning remotely
attributes.additional_details: School teachers have worked incredibly hard over the last term responding to the pandemic. On the penultimate day of term, the government announced that remote learning would take place for 1 week in January, causing unnecessary work over Christmas.  Direct teachers to use the government approved Oak Academy resources, selecting appropriate ones for their pupils.
